website_summaries.verdict: Made of parka material, these quilted earmuffs are designed to keep the wind out but let moisture escape.
pros: Breathable faux fur lined interior blocks wind while letting moisture out
Adjustable click-to-fit frame fits varying head sizes
Behind-the-head design fits comfortably over your ears while keeping your hairstyle intact
Comes in a variety of colors

customer_reviews.title: Love 180s!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of unisex 180s for 12 years which sadly died last winter. I just purchased these and like them way better than my old ones. I love the fact they can be adjusted which my old ones couldn't. These are also warmer. The only difference is that these dont fold as flat and compact but they still fit nicely in the purse so it's still a win!
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Only for small heads
customer_reviews.text: These do keep your ears warm and I do like that you wear them behind your head instead of over. I do find I have to take them off regularly when they begin to hurt because they are so tight. I pull them apart as far as they stretch, but as they’re worn, they gradually tighten up again. I really don’t have a big head, so if it bothers me, I think many others will have the same experience. All that being said, you definitely don’t have to worry about them slipping off!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Warm, classy and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I bought these! I like that they have a patterned stitching on them, so they stand out a bit more than the solid color ones. They are warm and fit nicely. They are still comfortable when wearing headphones too! They only time they are not comfortable is when you're wearing headphones, while wearing glasses and have earrings in. Sounds silly, but I commute to work and sometimes that trifecta happens during the winter! Other than that, they are wonderful, classy and very convenient to have.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great little carry on when traveling
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a winter trip to Germany and used them everyday! They were perfect and didn't give me "hat hair." I actually caught a nasty cold and the ear warmers really helped a lot with that! They are nice and small so easy to pack and carry in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Painful over ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically because so many reviews said they were comfortable over ear buds. They are not. My ears hurt so bad may not use these for anything other than shoveling snow. They were very warm but can’t use these over either pair of my wireless ear buds. Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseM

customer_reviews.title: Tight!
customer_reviews.text: Very tight and uncomfortable. I realize they need to be snug to fit, but it felt like my head was in a vice. Did NOT work with glasses. Could not stand to have these one for more than 30 seconds. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Beth J.

customer_reviews.title: Not over the head ear muffs!  Please refund the whole amount, not just part of what I paid!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was intact, but I thought it was an over the head ear muff. The back of the neck ear muffs never stay on my ears. So I am returning the product. Also the plastic box in which they came was very flimsy and arrived broken, although the ear muffs weren't damaged. now you are only refunding $21.xx when they cost me $24.68. Please refund me the whole amount!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: the tuse

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Always been a fan of the 180's. A pair I've had for almost 10 years finally broke, and I needed a replacement. These are more attractive than the pair I had, and seem a little warmer too. Perfect for cold New Hampshire winters. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jennfer D. Siik

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I wouldn’t recommend them. Even on the smallest setting, they slip right off. The one occasion they did stay on, my ears were incredibly sore a few hours later because I had sone earrings on. I’m sure they work for some people but they’re just not for me. I’ll stick to my beanies for now.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Not used to how they fit. They feel like they are going to fall off but havent on asphalt roads. Will check back in after I do some mountian roads and pot holes.
customer_reviews.author: Musicman44mag

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. As a woman I don't want to destroy ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. As a woman I don't want to destroy my hair style and these ear warmers are perfect. I have used this product for over 10 years and never want to brave a winter without them. Great for men, women and children.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my original 180s as the fabric is slippery, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: FYI

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I had a pair like these that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I had a pair like these that I lost. I tried another brand, thinking a cheaper pair would be better in case I lost them again, but they didn't fit as well. So I bought another pair of these. Completely worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Cognitive Psychologist

customer_reviews.title: A trusted and durable one in quality, features,  and functionality
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped and delivered on time. The item itself looks great and superior in quality., The packing was also great so it can be reused for its storage purpose. The item has flexibility to be folded and worn in a wrist when not in use and that is another good feature I always look for from these ear muffs.
customer_reviews.author: Myfin Milan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact, and keep your ears warm!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to put in your pocket or purse for when you need them. Bought them because I do not like hats and staticky hair.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my head
customer_reviews.text: It may not be the ear warmed, but rather the shape of my head. It doesn't fit me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous and highly portable!! Thankyou to whoever made these things ! I love them!!! Don’t detract from Hair either !!! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Yep they work great - I lost some similar ones and wanted to ...
customer_reviews.text: Yep they work great - I lost some similar ones and wanted to make sure I got the same quality. These fit the bill. They are more streamlined (in a good way) then they appear on line. The quilting is not too bulky
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend if you wear glasses. They are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Burton

customer_reviews.title: My first pair were white (not the best decision I've made)
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of 180s. Unfortunately, after 9 years of managing not to lose my first pair, they got lost somewhere while running errands. My first pair were white (not the best decision I've made). So, this time I opted for black ones and so far, love them just as much as my previous pair! They are comfy and do the trick without messing up my hair like a hat or regular ear muffs would!
customer_reviews.author: themoonstone

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: First ear warmers that stay on my ears! Love them! I live in Central NY and it gets cold and windy. These ear warmers keep my ears toasty warm!
customer_reviews.author: Teddie

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not as fuzzy as expected, but warm and comfortable. These are good for my commute and walking around town (I live in Philly area), but may not be substantial enough for very cold/windy weather (unless you run warm). Easy to adjust and they fold up easily to fit in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: JMEW Family

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay on but when they're on, they're warm.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side and the don't like to stay on if you're moderately active. But they are warm and cute.
customer_reviews.author: ladytichborne

customer_reviews.title: Flexible.. not like dollar store ones
customer_reviews.text: This muff is of great quality. Very flexible and folds easily and neatly. Keeps your ears warm no matter how windy. Very good purchase. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: FigMommy Love

customer_reviews.title: There easy to store anywhere and light weight .
customer_reviews.text: I really like how they snug to your ears keeping out the wind . And one size fits all . I would defiantly buy this brand again .
customer_reviews.author: Karleesha

customer_reviews.title: protect from wind-the best ones
customer_reviews.text: the 180's are great, they don't fall off-they cover my ears from the wind. now its my job to not lose yet another pair thanks for the prompt service as well
customer_reviews.author: RK.MA

customer_reviews.title: cold Minnesota winters
customer_reviews.text: My daughter rec'd these for a Christmas gift and she loves them. Super warm!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: I love how warm and wind proof these earmuffs are
customer_reviews.text: I love how warm and wind proof these earmuffs are. They could be a little bit smaller as they move a little bit. The biggest disappointment I have is that the UPS, driver who dropped them off must be a chain smoker as the package they came in and the muffs smelled so badly of cigarettes that I had to leave them outside to get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Katheleen Mazurek

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I just love these ear muffs. They are adjustable and stay put. Also they do not hurt my ears!
customer_reviews.author: deba

customer_reviews.title: Ears are warm!
customer_reviews.text: I needed ear warmers to run in in the winter because my ears would always freeze. I was skeptical about these because they wrap around the back of your head and I was worried if I ran that they would fall off and I would fidget with them too much. They ended up working great and my ears are warm in the cold! No issues with falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Dressy Earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Previously lost these ear warmers and wanted another! So glad to find an exact duplicate! Fit nice - looks dressy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Koets

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved these. She liked them because they didn't mess up her hair and she could clip them to her purse. They were super soft and kept her ears nice and toasty. Would highly recommend and will have to buy again because she lost her pair. She's been bugging me to get her another.
customer_reviews.author: Bio_Nerd

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Spent the week of Christmas in NYC with these beauties and let me tell ya they were needed and PERFECT! They were comfy and WARM! I was able to wrap them around my wrist when shopping and was able to keep them from being lost or dropping out of my coat pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Perez

customer_reviews.title: Toasty
customer_reviews.text: They fit nicely and keep my ears wary without messing up my hair!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these in December in Europe and they kept me warm as I spent most of my time walking around outside. They didn’t slip very easily, but some. The warmth made it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: This product was uncomfortable. I wear glasses and the earmuff had a very tight fit against my ear and was painful. I have returned the product. The product was very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Will keep ears warm however does not stay in place ...
customer_reviews.text: Will keep ears warm however does not stay in place very well. To be honest my head is a bit on the larger size so when I pull the warmer to the widest size they don't stay up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: 180’s never disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: 180’s never disappoint. Perfect size, adjustable in the back and snug!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie N Schafrath

customer_reviews.title: Warm comfy and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Great to stay warm around the winter camp fire. Also love how compact they are and they adjust nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jenzard

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me.
customer_reviews.text: I find for me these ear muffs are too short. I have an average size woman's head, but they barely fit around my head and cover my ears. This makes my ears hurt. I cannot stretch them any further. I will keep them because the price minus shipping isn't worth my time. Perhaps an older child in my family can wear them?
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky and still super warm!
customer_reviews.text: These were great for the few days I spent in NYC this winter! Very light, warm and comfortable even with my glasses and earrings on as well! Didn't mess up my hair either. I would definitely purchase these again if necessary!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Black

customer_reviews.title: Best ear warmers I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: These ear warmers are wonderful. They keep the cold air off my ears which is very important, and toasty warm. If you are thinking about buying these warmers do so. They stay in place and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable fit.  Could be a quarter of an inch larger diameter for better warmth coverage
customer_reviews.text: Warm, comfortable fit. Could be a quarter of an inch larger diameter for better warmth coverage
customer_reviews.author: Hawkmeister

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These were too small for my adult head, so I'm giving them away. I ordered a man's size and they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are ideal for those who don't like to wear hats.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a cold environment but don't like to wear hats. These ear warmers do the trick. They are comfortable and washable. When I don't need them when it warms up, they can be stored in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: These 180 ear warmers changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these 180 ear warmers. I did just only start using them,but they adjust perfectly to my head. I was a bit worried too, since I think I might have an oversized head. I have a condition that sends pain all along my nerves if they get cold a t all, and these are thick enough that the cold air can't hurt me anymore! They are fashion forward since no one can even tell they are other unless they are close up to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my ears cozy and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a pair of these ear warmers, but lost them at the end of last winter season. I’m sooooo glad my daughter told me where to get them, because I couldn’t find them in a store anymore. I absolutely love these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pri W

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT
customer_reviews.text: It was too small and did not even wrap around to my ears. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shipped quickly and just right fit
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfortable, easily adjustable, portable and fit nicely in my coat pocket. They are a bit of a sound buffer, so it's hard to hear a friend with a soft voice while wearing them, but other than that, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Too small, would fit a child maybe
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head and these maxed out barely cover the front of my ears no matter which way I position it. Wont be wearing much but they didn't slide around for me, just don't fit well at all. These are in no way womens or even junior in size.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! And they fit perfectly! I was surprised that they were fuzzy on the inside. Had no idea from the pictures. I looove these. They're cute and keep my ears warm in these stupid Boston winters.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Best ear warmers around
customer_reviews.text: I have one pair of these that I have been using for 9 years. I bought a new pair this year. They last, they fit and the keep you warm. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FOR ME!!
customer_reviews.text: I work outside as a baggage handler at Newark Airport, and with these cold, freezing winds this 180s ear muffs really helps to keep my ears from freezing. Good fit and stays in place. Happy with this product, now only if I can find the right gloves to keep my fingers from freezing.....
customer_reviews.author: Babs6

customer_reviews.title: I found them difficult to adjust so that they were ...
customer_reviews.text: I found them difficult to adjust so that they were secure in position. If I run with them on, they keep slipping around causing the rim to bother my ears. I've tried tighter and looser and just can't find the right position when running. They are warm though.
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely warm!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and lost 180 ear warmers in the past. This new pair is utterly delightful and keep my ears very, very warm against the infamous Chicago winds. My only complaint, a minor one at that, is that sometimes that have a tendency to slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley C.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are warm but do add lots of pressure around the ears, very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jrb

customer_reviews.title: Done
customer_reviews.text: warm-fits well - and in your discription you need to include “they wrap around your wrist so your not going to loose them when you take them off”
customer_reviews.author: A Stone

customer_reviews.title: ... of the 180s ear warmers and they are all wonderful! Recipients loved them as well
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of the 180s ear warmers and they are all wonderful! Recipients loved them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Kasar

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! The pair I'm wearing this winter is the pair I bought last year, they're still in perfect condition and keep my ears nice and warm. But not sweaty-warm.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Yanko

customer_reviews.title: I love these because they don't mess up my hair when ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they don't mess up my hair when I am on the way to the office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT smaller than the men's version
customer_reviews.text: I was lead to believe that these were a smaller size than the man's version, they are NOT. I have a smaller head and the band around the back sticks out considerably from the back of my head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft and well adjusted
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated on which ear warmer to buy, and choose that one. I am happy. It is warm, soft and well adjusted on my ears. I can wear only this or this under a hat. It works well. It looks nice for sport attire as well as with my more formal coat.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Head and shoulders abovr
customer_reviews.text: These are the warmest, nicest ear muff I have ever had. The quilted outside matched my winter coat and the fit is perfect. Not a wasted cent of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Feltham

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Definately not worth the $! Slips off my head. Sooo returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love these earmuffs! They are not too bulky but also not too thin. I have no problem with them staying on. They keep my ears very warm while walking the dog. They fit well under a hat as well.
customer_reviews.author: O. Vinogradova

customer_reviews.title: These ear warmers are super soft, super warm and fit great
customer_reviews.text: These ear warmers are super soft, super warm and fit great. Most stores don't carry ear warmers, I don't know why but the only ones I saw were cheap ones that were huge, uncomfortable and didn't adjust to fit your head. These are a great price too. They are such thick fur they do muffle sound somewhat, but I don't care because they are so warm.
customer_reviews.author: Morning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like to wear a hat to work as it wrecks my hair, so usually wear muffs. Lost my previous pair and I'm almost glad I did as these re perfect. Fit me just right and my ears stayed nice and toasty despite the -40 degree wind chill this week. I do not spend long periods of time outside in the winter so cannot attest to warmth over a period of time outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Granma B

customer_reviews.title: Super warm
customer_reviews.text: These are super warm and the second pair I bought. They are worn behind the head not over the top of the head. My husband wants a pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: I love these earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. They fit perfectly and they keep my ears warm. I love these earmuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bricker

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Perfect size for women and nice tight ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Perfect size for women and nice tight adjustable fit. They keep my esrs very warm and I would recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy these again
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could wear these on top of my head as my hair is long, so on the back of my neck they feel like they're going to fall off not Big enough even extended!
customer_reviews.author: Oden AK

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect. They cover your whole ear, stay in place and are small enough when folded to fit in my winter coat pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: replaced ones I lost that served me 10 years these ...
customer_reviews.text: replaced ones I lost that served me 10 years these are still well made and keep me warm in crazy -10 weather
customer_reviews.author: N. Dante

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable band snaps easily
customer_reviews.text: These are very warm and I like that they are smaller in size for ladies. However, the adjustable band broke within 5 minutes! I had to buy knock off from street vendor in NYC ...... So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Traveler

customer_reviews.title: No hat - No problem.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Winter is over and I can say that this ear warmer kept me warm. I wore it under my hair, and I did not feel the need for a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Isamarabela

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I wear this when it gets very cold out (5 degrees) and I have to walk to class (20 min). Keeps my ears warm and I can still wear earbuds underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Ng

customer_reviews.title: short but good
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. Keeps my ears warm but nt a huge fan of them. They are a little short
customer_reviews.author: Megvp

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Snug! The pair I purchased from Lowes and had for years broke. Wasn't sure I could find another pair until I located them here at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: gistm

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Five Stars *****
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these ear warmers. She says that they keep her ears warm and the wind out.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: 180s are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I have another pair that convinced me to get a second pair for work. I work in a refrigerated warehouse, so proper ear covering is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi P.

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and fold up nicely to fit in my pocket or purse
customer_reviews.text: The ear muffs came at the right time - cold spell in Ohio! They fit well and fold up nicely to fit in my pocket or purse. I wish I had purchased them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: Warm ears
customer_reviews.text: Love these ear warmers!!! They keep my ears toasty and don’t mess up my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!! Go with any coat and adjust to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! Go with any coat and adjust to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shazzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mother in law loves it. It doesn't mess up her hair style when she goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm
customer_reviews.text: Fits great around the back of my head and keeps my ears toasty warm with quilted fabric. Any 'earmuff' is a problem for Bluetooth hardware and I haven't figured that one out yet. I think I'd rather be warm!
customer_reviews.author: Trayfesmom

customer_reviews.title: What do I think?
customer_reviews.text: Keep my ears warm; however, tight. Hopefully in time they will relax.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... were for my Mother and she said they are good, which is a great compliment coming from her
customer_reviews.text: These were for my Mother and she said they are good, which is a great compliment coming from her!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these ear warmers. They fit very well and stay in place. They also keep my ears nice and warm even at 30 below!!
customer_reviews.author: Holster

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for myself and one for my sister. We love them. They fit snugly over the ears and keep them warm as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Rath

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs fit perfectly behind my neck. Also, they fit my generous ears and my friends tiny ears equally well. Soft, thick quilting added to the lovely feel.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn

customer_reviews.title: 180s women's keystone ear warmer is the best for keeping air out of one's ear and so ...
customer_reviews.text: 180s women's keystone ear warmer is the best for keeping air out of one's ear and so comfortable. i love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Very good earmuffs. Bought two pair
customer_reviews.text: Very good earmuffs. Bought two pair. Wife loves them. Second pair was a little too big for my 11 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, I have short hair so hats are out for me. They keep your ears toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job keeping my ears warm and are excellent at blocking out wind. Very comfortable, no problems with any slipping. They do muffle sounds a bit (which is not necessarily a bad thing) - just something to be aware of. I got these in black and they look great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caroleena

customer_reviews.title: He can't say enough about how warm they were and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my nephew who works on a horse farm. He can't say enough about how warm they were and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, comfortable, and well fitting earmuffs!
customer_reviews.text: The 180 earmuffs fit perfectly and are very good looking too. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: War, easy to put on, and are comfortable while staying in place when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick A. Mihalow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good - keeps my ears warm and I can still hear the traffic as I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Warm Those Ears
customer_reviews.text: Well made, love that they are adjustable, and fit tightly but comfortably over ears.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Great ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: Great ear muffs, they do muffle the sound a little as other reviews have suggested but it's worth the soft, warm protection they provide.
customer_reviews.author: E_now

product_meta.title: 180S Women's Keystone Ear Warmer
product_meta.description: This faux fur lined ear warmer is made with a nylon puffy quilt shell that is warm, breathable, and wind resistant
feature_bullets: Breathable faux-fur lining blocks wind while allowing moisture vapor to escape
Adjustable click-to-fit frame fits varying head sizes
Patented behind the head design fits comfortable over your ears while keeping your hairstyle intact
